data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Mannar words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mannar, Sri Lanka
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Mannar.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Mannar, Sri Lanka that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Mannar, Sri Lanka that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Yamannu people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, help your children in Mannar, Sri Lanka find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Mannar access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Mannar, Sri Lanka.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Mannar
location.people_groups_list: Shaikh, Pidayne Danno, Sayyid, Yadav (Hindu traditions), Sri Lanka Moor
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Shaikh (200,000), Pidayne Danno (8,800), Sayyid (49,000), Yadav (Hindu traditions) (7,300), Sri Lanka Moor (676,000)
